sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import f1 from "./img/Frame 1.png" import f2 from "./img/Frame 2.png" import "./css/about.css" const About =()=>{ const [data, set]=useState({ fname:"", lname:"", email:"", number:"", service:"", about:"" }); const getstarted=()=>{ } return(<>
